name: 赫胥黎·费希尔
name_full: 赫胥黎·费希尔 Huxley Fisher

last_movies.title: 最后生还者 第二季

introduction: Huxley Fisher is both a dual Canadian and American actor, born in Calgary, Alberta Canada. Having his first role at 5 years old on the series, Heartland, he has since had roles on most notably to date: The Order starring Nicholas Hoult and Jude Law, Black Mirror Season 7, The Birds Who Fear Death, Night of the Reaper, and the upcoming series: Unspeakable: The Murder of Jon Benet Ramsey with Paramount Pictures.
